title: Apostle Islands National Lakeshore: Park Home
body: Jewels of Lake Superior  Along windswept beaches and cliffs, visitors experience where water meets land and sky, culture meets culture, and past meets present. The 21 islands and 12 miles of mainland host a unique blend of cultural and natural resources.Â  Lighthouses shine over Lake Superior and the new wilderness areas. Visitors can hike, paddle, sail, or cruise to experience these Jewels of Lake Superior.                Camping in the Apostles   Follow this link for more information on camping in the Apostles.        Getting to the Islands   Click here for more information on how to get to the islands.              Weather   Click here for more information on weather around the Apostles.        Maps   Click here to find all the maps you need for a successful trip.
